name: Particle
description: Class to spawn Particle Systems used to create effects in the world.

functions.name: IsActive
functions.description: Returns if this Particle is active

functions.name: SetParameterFloat
functions.description: Sets a float parameter in this Particle System

functions.name: SetParameterInt
functions.description: Sets an integer parameter in this Particle System

functions.name: SetParameterBool
functions.description: Sets a boolean parameter in this Particle System

functions.name: SetParameterVector
functions.description: Sets a Vector parameter in this Particle System

functions.name: SetParameterColor
functions.description: Sets a Color parameter in this Particle System

functions.name: SetParameterMaterial
functions.description: Sets a Material parameter in this Particle System

functions.name: SetParameterMaterialFromTexture
functions.description: Sets a Material from a Texture parameter in this Particle System
functions.description_long: This will create a Material and set this Texture as it's parameter internally, then set the Material into the Particle parameter

functions.name: SetParameterMaterialFromCanvas
functions.description: Sets a Material from a Canvas parameter in this Particle System
functions.description_long: This will create a Material and set this Canvas as it's parameter internally, then set the Material into the Particle parameter

functions.name: SetParameterMaterialFromWebUI
functions.description: Sets a Material from a Canvas parameter in this Particle System
functions.description_long: This will create a Material and set this WebUI as it's parameter internally, then set the Material into the Particle parameter
